verses.verse: The <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H9198>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2372>saw<s%> during the <S%H3117>reigns<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> [and] <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen,<s%> O <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H238>hear,<s%> O <S%H776>earth;<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>speaks,<s%> <S%H1121>"Sons<s%> I have <S%H1431>reared<s%> and <S%H7311>brought<s%> up, But they have <S%H6586>revolted<s%> against Me.

"An <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> its <S%H7069>owner,<s%> And a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> its master's <S%H18>manger,<s%> [But] <S%H3478>Israel<s%> does not <S%H3045>know,<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> do not <S%H995>understand.<s%>"

<S%H1945>Alas,<s%> <S%H2398>sinful<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H5971>People<s%> <S%H3515>weighed<s%> <S%H3515>down<s%> with <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H2233>Offspring<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> <S%H1121>Sons<s%> who <S%H7843>act<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly!<s%> They have <S%H5800>abandoned<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> They have <S%H5006>despised<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> They have <S%H2114>turned<s%> <S%H2114>away<s%> from Him.

<S%H5921>Where<s%> <S%H4100><s%> will you be <S%H5221>stricken<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> [As] you <S%H3254>continue<s%> in [your] <S%H5627>rebellion<s%>? The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H2483>sick,<s%> And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H1742>faint.<s%>

From the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of the <S%H7272>foot<s%> even to the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H4974>sound<s%> in it, [Only] <S%H6482>bruises,<s%> <S%H2250>welts,<s%> and <S%H2961>raw<s%> <S%H4347>wounds,<s%> Not <S%H2115>pressed<s%> out or <S%H2280>bandaged,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H7401>softened<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

Your <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> Your <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> Your <S%H127>fields<s%> – <S%H2114>strangers<s%> are <S%H398>devouring<s%> them in your <S%H5048>presence;<s%> It is <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> as <S%H4114>overthrown<s%> by <S%H2114>strangers.<s%>

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> is <S%H3498>left<s%> like a <S%H5521>shelter<s%> in a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> Like a <S%H4412>watchman<s%>'s <S%H4412>hut<s%> in a <S%H4750>cucumber<s%> <S%H4750>field,<s%> like a <S%H5341>besieged<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H3884>Unless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> Had <S%H3498>left<s%> us a <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H8300>survivors,<s%> We would be like <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> We would be <S%H1819>like<s%> <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> You <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom;<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to the <S%H8451>instruction<s%> of our God, You <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> are your <S%H7230>multiplied<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> to Me?" <S%H559>Says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "I have <S%H7646>had<s%> <S%H7646>enough<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> And the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H4806>fed<s%> <S%H4806>cattle.<s%> And I <S%H2654>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> or <S%H6260>goats.<s%>
<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me, <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H1245>requires<s%> of you <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H7429>trampling<s%> of My <S%H2691>courts<s%>?

<S%H935>"Bring<s%> your <S%H7723>worthless<s%> <S%H4503>offerings<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer,<s%> <S%H7004>Incense<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to Me. <S%H2320>New<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> and <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> the <S%H7121>calling<s%> of <S%H4744>assemblies<s%> – I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201>endure<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and the <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly.<s%>

"I <S%H8130>hate<s%> your <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> [festivals] and your <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> They have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2960>burden<s%> to Me. I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> of <S%H5375>bearing<s%> [them.]

"So when you <S%H6566>spread<s%> out your <S%H3709>hands<s%> [in prayer,] I will <S%H5956>hide<s%> My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from you, <S%H1571>Yes,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> you <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H8605>prayers,<s%> I will not <S%H8085>listen.<s%> Your <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H4390>covered<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

<S%H7364>"Wash<s%> yourselves, <S%H2135>make<s%> yourselves <S%H2135>clean;<s%> <S%H5493>Remove<s%> the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>deeds<s%> from My <S%H5048>sight.<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H2308>Cease<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil,<s%>

<S%H3925>Learn<s%> to <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>good;<s%> <S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> <S%H833>Reprove<s%> the <S%H2541>ruthless;<s%> <S%H8199>Defend<s%> the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> <S%H7378>Plead<s%> for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

<S%H1980>"Come<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and let us <S%H3198>reason<s%> together," <S%H559>Says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H518>"Though<s%> your <S%H2399>sins<s%> are as <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> They will be as <S%H3835>white<s%> as <S%H7950>snow;<s%> <S%H518>Though<s%> they are <S%H119>red<s%> like <S%H8438>crimson,<s%> They will be like <S%H6785>wool.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H14>consent<s%> and <S%H8085>obey,<s%> You will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>best<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> and <S%H4784>rebel,<s%> You will be <S%H398>devoured<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>" <S%H3588>Truly,<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H351>How<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> She [who] was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4941>justice!<s%> <S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> once <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in her, But <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7523>murderers.<s%>
Your <S%H3701>silver<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5509>dross,<s%> Your <S%H5435>drink<s%> <S%H4107>diluted<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Your <S%H8269>rulers<s%> are <S%H5637>rebels,<s%> And <S%H2270>companions<s%> of <S%H1590>thieves;<s%> <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> And <S%H7291>chases<s%> after <S%H8021>rewards.<s%> They do not <S%H8199>defend<s%> the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> does the widow's <S%H7379>plea<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> them.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> The <S%H46>Mighty<s%> <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5002>declares,<s%> "Ah, I will be <S%H5162>relieved<s%> of My <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And <S%H5358>avenge<s%> Myself on My <S%H340>foes.<s%>

"I will also <S%H7725>turn<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, And will <S%H6884>smelt<s%> away your <S%H5509>dross<s%> as with <S%H1253>lye,<s%> And will <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H913>alloy.<s%>

"Then I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> And your <S%H3289>counselors<s%> as at the <S%H8462>beginning;<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> that you will be <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> A <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>city.<s%>"
<S%H6726>Zion<s%> will be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> with <S%H4941>justice,<s%> And her <S%H7725>repentant<s%> ones with <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

But <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> will be <S%H7667>crushed<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> And those who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3615>come<s%> to an <S%H3615>end.<s%>

<S%H3588>Surely,<s%> you will be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of the <S%H9013>oaks<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H2530>desired,<s%> And you will be <S%H2659>embarrassed<s%> at the <S%H1593>gardens<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H977>chosen.<s%>
For you will be like an <S%H424>oak<s%> whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> <S%H5034>fades<s%> <S%H5034>away,<s%> Or as a <S%H1593>garden<s%> that <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And the <S%H2634>strong<s%> <S%H2634>man<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5296>tinder,<s%> His <S%H6467>work<s%> also a <S%H5213>spark.<s%> Thus they shall <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3518>quench<s%> [them].
